attributes.action: Stop pets at home from housing multiple hamsters in tiny cages
attributes.additional_details: Because it is a matter that I don’t feel anyone else can undertake and feel that the government and Parliament have more authority and contacts into undergoing the correct investigations via authorised companies that they may have links too
attributes.background: Stop pets at home from caging up multiple hamsters in tiny cages and selling inadequate sized cages that don’t meet the needs of hamsters and undertake investigations into the care that pets at home show towards the hamsters and small animals

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649562
